Title: Military Academy
Writer: Carsten Funke, Granz Henman, Robert Loehr, Oliver Philipp, Oliver Ziegenbalg
Actors: Franz Dinda, Florian Lukas, Axel Stein, Kailas Mahadevan
Plot: Basti, doesn't want to go to the Bundeswehr and writes a denial. But as his mate who fancies Basti's girlfriend "forgets" to send the denial Basti is taken in by the Bundeswehr- What seemed to be a nightmare soon becomes a funny adventure.
